channel.title: Gs stances
channel.description: Hey, when i got my source and all it had the gs stances but only for the normal ones such as ags, bgs, sgs, and zgs. When I added a custom gs it doesn't have the correct gs stance.. I just hold it like a sword. I was wondering how to make the custom gs i added to be like the regular gs stance... Thanks!

item.title: Gs stances
item.dc:creator: @jake_cake jake cake
item.description:

Oh, and how do I make an item 2 handed?

item.title: Gs stances
item.dc:creator: @blitz_ags blitz ags
item.description:
@blitz_ags wrote:

Client.java search for,

public int GetWepAnim(int id)
if(id == 746 || id == 667 || id == 35 || id == 2402 || id == 8100 || id == CustomID)
public int GetRunAnim(int id)
if(id == 746 || id == 667 || id == 35 || id == 2402 || id == 8100 || id == CustomID)
public int GetWalkAnim(int id)
if(id == 746 || id == 667 || id == 35 || id == 2402 || id == 8100 || id == CustomID)
public int GetStandAnim(int id)
if(id == 746 || id == 667 || id == 35 || id == 2402 || id == 8100 || id == CustomID)
public int GetBlockAnim()
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 667 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2402 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8100 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 746 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == CustomID)

And add the ID of your new godsword with the normal one (ags, bgs, sgs and zgs).

Read full topic
